item.title: Using dlv to debug Golang container on Kubernetes
item.description: An interesting question on Stack overflow prompted me to understand how to use Visual Studio Code and Delve to remotely debug a Golang app running on Kubernetes (MicroK8s). The OP is using Gin which was also new to me so the question gave me an opportunity to try out several things.
